title: Annual report of National Commission on Status of Women tabled in Senate
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 23 (APP):The Minister for Human Rights on Friday laid the Annual Report 2022â€“23 of the National Commission on the Status of Women (NCSW) before the Senate.
The report was submitted in compliance with sub-section (2) of Section 16 of the National Commission on the Status of Women Act, 2012.
Senator Dr. Shezra Mansab Ali Kharal tabled the report on behalf of the ministry.
